summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, suggesting that Staley should consider delaying a meeting due to an impending hurricane. The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, advising Jes Staley to delay a meeting.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, receiving advice from Epstein regarding a meeting.

connections.description: Epstein is advising Staley on a personal matter regarding a meeting.

keyFacts: The email suggests delaying a meeting due to a hurricane.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein emphasizes the importance of confidentiality and unauthorized use of the email.
